title: Decision Activity Criteria
description: One or more constraints that evaluate to lists of "top N best" options in the context of a decision activity. Those options satisfy all constraints for a given placement and are ordered by some function.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: Criteria
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: Defines a set of decision criteria where each contains a set of constraints.
